s0301: Hui Gong horse stumbled not advance, Qin troops arrived, Gong distressed, summoned Qing Zheng as driver.
s0302: Zheng said: 'Not use divination, defeat not also proper!'
s0304: Changed commanded Liang You Mi drove, Guo She as right, attacked Qin Mu Gong.
s0305: Mu Gong brave men risked defeated Jin army, Jin army defeated, then lost Qin Mu Gong, instead obtained Jin Gong returned.
s0307: Jin lord elder sister for Mu Gong wife, mourning clothes wept.
s0308: Gong said: 'Obtained Jin Hou will make pleasure, now like this.
s0309: Moreover I heard Ji Zi saw Tang Shu initial enfeoffment, said 'its after must greatly', Jin how able extinguish!'
s0310: Then allied with Jin Hou at Wang Cheng permitted him return.
s0311: Jin Hou also sent Lu Sheng etc. report country people said: 'Orphan though obtain return, no face see state altar, divine day establish Zi Yu.'
s0312: Jin people heard it, all cried.
s0313: Qin Mu Gong asked Lu Sheng: 'Jin country peaceful?'
s0315: Small people fear lose lord perish relatives, not dread establish Zi Yu, said 'must repay enmity, rather serve Rong, Di'.
s0316: Its gentlemen then love lord know crime, wait Qin command, said 'must repay virtue'.
s0317: Have this two reasons, not peaceful.'
s0318: Then Qin Mu Gong changed lodge Jin Hui Gong, presented seven cattle.
s0320: Jin Hou to country, executed Qing Zheng, cultivated government teaching.
s0321: Plotted said: 'Chong Er outside, feudal lords many profit inner him.'
s0322: Wished send people kill Chong Er at Di.
s0323: Chong Er heard it, went Qi.
s0324: Eighth year, sent crown prince Yu hostage Qin.
s0325: Initially, Hui Gong perished in Liang, Liang Bo with his daughter wife him, gave birth one male one female.
s0326: Liang Bo divined it, male for person minister, female for person concubine, so named male Yu, female concubine.
s0328: Liang Bo good earth works, governed city moat, people strength exhausted resented, its crowd several mutually alarmed, said 'Qin bandits arrive', people feared confused, Qin finally extinguished it.
s0329: Thirteenth year, Jin Hui Gong ill, inner had several sons.
s0330: Crown prince Yu said: 'My mother family in Liang, Liang now Qin extinguished it, I outside light at Qin inner no aid in country.
s0331: Lord if not rise, ill grand masters light, moreover establish other gong zi.'
s0332: Then plotted with his wife together fled return.
s0333: Qin woman said: 'You one country crown prince, humiliated here.
s0334: Qin sent maid serve, to solidify your heart.
s0335: You fled, I not follow you, also not dare speak.'
s0336: Zi Yu then fled return Jin.
s0337: Fourteenth year ninth month, Hui Gong died, crown prince Yu established, this was Huai Gong.
s0338: Zi Yu perished, Qin resented it, then sought gong zi Chong Er, wished inner him.
s0339: Zi Yu establish, feared Qin attack.
s0340: Then commanded country various follow Chong Er perished with period, period completely not arrive completely extinguish their family.
s0341: Hu Tu son Mao and Yan followed Chong Er in Qin, not willing summon.

s0343: Tu said: 'Minister son served Chong Er have year number, now summon him, is teach him reverse lord.
s0345: Huai Gong finally killed Hu Tu.
s0346: Qin Mu Gong then sent troops sent inner Chong Er, sent people informed Luan, Xi party as inner support, killed Huai Gong at Gao Liang, entered Chong Er.
